verses.verse: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said דָּוִ֤יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid Furthermore David הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech the king לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol to the entire הַקָּהָ֔ל <S%H6951><s%> hak-ka-Hal, unto all the congregation שְׁלֹמֹ֨ה <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh Solomon בְנִ֥י <S%H1121><s%> ve-Ni my son אֶחָ֛ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad whom alone בָּֽחַר־ <S%H977><s%> ba-char- hath chosen בּ֥וֹ bo אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God נַ֣עַר <S%H5288><s%> Na-'ar [is yet] young וָרָ֑ךְ <S%H7390><s%> va-Rach; and tender וְהַמְּלָאכָ֣ה <S%H4399><s%> ve-ham-me-la-Chah and the work גְדוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah, [is] great כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo for לְאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> le-'a-Dam [is] not for man הַבִּירָ֔ה <S%H1002><s%> hab-bi-Rah, for the palace כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh but for the LORD אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. God

וּֽכְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-che-chol- all כֹּחִ֞י <S%H3581><s%> ko-Chi with all my might הֲכִינ֣וֹתִי <S%H3559><s%> ha-chi-No-ti Now I have prepared לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> le-veit- for the house אֱלֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai, of my God הַזָּהָ֣ב׀ <S%H2091><s%> haz-za-Hav the gold לַ֠זָּהָב <S%H2091><s%> laz-za-ho for [things to be made] of gold וְהַכֶּ֨סֶף <S%H3701><s%> ve-hak-Ke-sef and the silver לַכֶּ֜סֶף <S%H3701><s%> lak-Ke-sef for [things] of silver וְהַנְּחֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> ve-han-ne-Cho-shet and the brass לַנְּחֹ֗שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> lan-ne-Cho-shet, for [things] of brass הַבַּרְזֶל֙ <S%H1270><s%> hab-bar-Zel the iron לַבַּרְזֶ֔ל <S%H1270><s%> lab-bar-Zel, for [things] of iron וְהָעֵצִ֖ים <S%H6086><s%> ve-ha-'e-Tzim and wood לָעֵצִ֑ים <S%H6086><s%> la-'e-Tzim; for [things] of wood אַבְנֵי־ <S%H68><s%> 'av-nei- stones שֹׁ֨הַם <S%H7718><s%> Sho-ham onyx וּמִלּוּאִ֜ים <S%H4394><s%> u-mil-lu-'Im and [stones] to be set אַבְנֵי־ <S%H68><s%> 'av-nei- stones פ֣וּךְ <S%H6320><s%> fuch glistering וְרִקְמָ֗ה <S%H7553><s%> ve-rik-Mah, and of divers colours וְכֹ֨ל <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol and all אֶ֧בֶן <S%H68><s%> 'E-ven stones יְקָרָ֛ה <S%H3368><s%> ye-ka-Rah and all manner of precious וְאַבְנֵי־ <S%H68><s%> ve-'av-nei- stones שַׁ֖יִשׁ <S%H7893><s%> Sha-yish and marble לָרֹֽב׃ <S%H7230><s%> la-Ro. in abundance

וְע֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> ve-'od, Moreover בִּרְצוֹתִי֙ <S%H7521><s%> bir-tzo-Ti Moreover because I have set my affection בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit to the house אֱלֹהַ֔י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai, of my God יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> yesh- I have לִ֥י li סְגֻלָּ֖ה <S%H5459><s%> se-gul-Lah of mine own proper good זָהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav of gold וָכָ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> va-Cha-sef; and silver נָתַ֤תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti [which] I have given לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> le-veit- to the house אֱלֹהַי֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai of my God לְמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> le-Ma'-lah, over and above מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all הֲכִינ֖וֹתִי <S%H3559><s%> ha-chi-No-ti all that I have prepared לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit house הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh. for the holy

שְׁלֹ֧שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> she-Lo-shet [Even] three אֲלָפִ֛ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand כִּכְּרֵ֥י <S%H3603><s%> kik-ke-Rei talents זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav of gold מִזְּהַ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> miz-ze-Hav of the gold אוֹפִ֑יר <S%H211><s%> o-Fir; of Ophir וְשִׁבְעַ֨ת <S%H7651><s%> ve-shiv-'At and seven אֲלָפִ֤ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand כִּכַּר־ <S%H3603><s%> kik-kar- talents כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> ke-sef silver מְזֻקָּ֔ק <S%H2212><s%> me-zuk-Kak, of refined לָט֖וּחַ <S%H2902><s%> la-Tu-ach to overlay קִיר֥וֹת <S%H7023><s%> ki-Rot the walls הַבָּתִּֽים׃ <S%H1004><s%> hab-bat-Tim. of the houses

לַזָּהָ֤ב <S%H2091><s%> laz-za-Hav The gold לַזָּהָב֙ <S%H2091><s%> laz-za-Hav for [things] of gold וְלַכֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> ve-lak-Ke-sef and the silver לַכֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> lak-Ke-sef, for [things] of silver וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-le-chol- is for all מְלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> me-la-Chah and for all manner of work בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad [to be made] by the hands חָרָשִׁ֑ים <S%H2796><s%> cha-ra-Shim; of artificers וּמִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> u-Mi Who מִתְנַדֵּ֔ב <S%H5068><s%> mit-nad-Dev, And who [then] is willing לְמַלֹּ֥אות <S%H4390><s%> le-mal-Lot to consecrate יָד֛וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do his service הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom this day לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. Jehovah

וַיִּֽתְנַדְּבוּ֩ <S%H5068><s%> vai-yit-nad-de-Vu offered willingly שָׂרֵ֨י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei Then the chief הָאָב֜וֹת <S%H1><s%> ha-'a-Vot of the fathers וְשָׂרֵ֣י׀ <S%H8269><s%> ve-sa-Rei and princes שִׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> shiv-Tei of the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וְשָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> ve-sa-Rei and the captains הָאֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> ha-'a-la-Fim of thousands וְהַמֵּא֔וֹת <S%H3967><s%> ve-ham-me-'ot, and of hundreds וּלְשָׂרֵ֖י <S%H8269><s%> u-le-sa-Rei with the rulers מְלֶ֥אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> me-Le-chet work הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech. of the king's

וַֽיִּתְּנ֞וּ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Nu And gave לַעֲבוֹדַ֣ת <S%H5656><s%> la-'a-vo-Dat for the service בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God זָהָ֞ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav of gold כִּכָּרִ֣ים <S%H3603><s%> kik-ka-Rim talents חֲמֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H2568><s%> cha-me-shet- five אֲלָפִים֮ <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand וַאֲדַרְכֹנִ֣ים <S%H150><s%> va-'a-dar-cho-Nim drams רִבּוֹ֒ <S%H7239><s%> rib-Bo and ten thousand וְכֶ֗סֶף <S%H3701><s%> ve-Che-sef, and of silver כִּכָּרִים֙ <S%H3603><s%> kik-ka-Rim talents עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <S%H6235><s%> 'a-Se-ret ten אֲלָפִ֔ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim, thousand וּנְחֹ֕שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> u-ne-Cho-shet and of brass רִבּ֛וֹ <S%H7239><s%> rib-Bo myriad וּשְׁמוֹנַ֥ת <S%H8083><s%> u-she-mo-Nat eight אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand כִּכָּרִ֑ים <S%H3603><s%> kik-ka-Rim; talents וּבַרְזֶ֖ל <S%H1270><s%> u-var-Zel of iron מֵֽאָה־ <S%H3967><s%> me-'ah- and one hundred אֶ֥לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand כִּכָּרִֽים׃ <S%H3603><s%> kik-ka-Rim. talents

וְהַנִּמְצָ֤א <S%H4672><s%> ve-han-nim-Tza were found אִתּוֹ֙ <S%H854><s%> it-To for אֲבָנִ֔ים <S%H68><s%> 'a-va-Nim, And they with whom [precious] stones נָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> na-te-Nu gave לְאוֹצַ֣ר <S%H214><s%> le-'o-Tzar [them] to the treasure בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- of the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD עַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al in יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> yad- by the hand יְחִיאֵ֖ל <S%H3171><s%> ye-chi-'El of Jehiel הַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּֽי׃ <S%H1649><s%> hag-ge-re-shun-Ni. the Gershonite

וַיִּשְׂמְח֤וּ <S%H8055><s%> vai-yis-me-Chu rejoiced הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am Then the people עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- because הִֽתְנַדְּבָ֔ם <S%H5068><s%> hit-nad-de-Vam, for that they offered willingly כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בְּלֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> be-Lev heart שָׁלֵ֔ם <S%H8003><s%> sha-Lem, because with perfect הִֽתְנַדְּב֖וּ <S%H5068><s%> hit-nad-de-Vu they offered willingly לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; to the LORD וְגַם֙ <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam also דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid and David הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech, the king שָׂמַ֖ח <S%H8055><s%> sa-Mach also rejoiced שִׂמְחָ֥ה <S%H8057><s%> sim-Chah joy גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah. with great פ Peh

וַיְבָ֤רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> vay-Va-rech blessed דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid Wherefore David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD לְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> le-'ei-Nei before כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all הַקָּהָ֑ל <S%H6951><s%> hak-ka-Hal; all the congregation וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said דָּוִ֗יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, and David בָּר֨וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> ba-Ruch Blessed אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah O יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [be] thou LORD אֱלֹהֵי֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אָבִ֔ינוּ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-nu, our father מֵעוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> me-'o-Lam ever וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. and ever

לְךָ֣ le-Cha יְ֠הוָה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God הַגְּדֻלָּ֨ה <S%H1420><s%> hag-ge-dul-Lah [is] the greatness וְהַגְּבוּרָ֤ה <S%H1369><s%> ve-hag-ge-vu-Rah and the power וְהַתִּפְאֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H8597><s%> ve-hat-tif-'E-ret and the glory וְהַנֵּ֣צַח <S%H5331><s%> ve-han-Ne-tzach and the victory וְהַה֔וֹד <S%H1935><s%> ve-ha-Hod, and the majesty כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- indeed כֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> chol everything בַּשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> bash-sha-Ma-yim for all [that is] in the heaven וּבָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> u-va-'A-retz; and in the earth לְךָ֤ le-Cha יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God הַמַּמְלָכָ֔ה <S%H4467><s%> ham-mam-la-Chah, [is thine] thine [is] the kingdom וְהַמִּתְנַשֵּׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> ve-ham-mit-nas-Se exalt לְכֹ֥ל׀ <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol all לְרֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7218><s%> le-Rosh. as head

וְהָעֹ֤שֶׁר <S%H6239><s%> ve-ha-'O-sher Both riches וְהַכָּבוֹד֙ <S%H3519><s%> ve-hak-ka-Vod and honour מִלְּפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> mil-le-fa-Nei-cha, [come] of thee וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah and You מוֹשֵׁ֣ל <S%H4910><s%> mo-Shel and thou reignest בַּכֹּ֔ל <S%H3605><s%> bak-Kol, all וּבְיָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> u-ve-ya-de-Cha over all and in thine hand כֹּ֣חַ <S%H3581><s%> Ko-ach [is] power וּגְבוּרָ֑ה <S%H1369><s%> u-ge-vu-Rah; and might וּבְיָ֣דְךָ֔ <S%H3027><s%> u-ve-Ya-de-cha, and in thine hand לְגַדֵּ֥ל <S%H1431><s%> le-gad-Del [it is] to make great וּלְחַזֵּ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> u-le-chaz-Zek and to give strength לַכֹּֽל׃ <S%H3605><s%> lak-Kol. everyone

וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah Now אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, Now therefore our God מוֹדִ֥ים <S%H3034><s%> mo-Dim we thank אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu ourselves לָ֑ךְ Lach; וּֽמְהַֽלְלִ֖ים <S%H1984><s%> u-me-hal-Lim thee and praise לְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> le-Shem name תִּפְאַרְתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H8597><s%> tif-'ar-Te-cha. thy glorious

וְכִ֨י <S%H3588><s%> ve-Chi But מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> mi who אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I וּמִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> u-Mi who עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi, But who [am] I and what [is] my people כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- should נַעְצֹ֣ר <S%H6113><s%> na'-Tzor that we should be כֹּ֔חַ <S%H3581><s%> Ko-ach, able לְהִתְנַדֵּ֖ב <S%H5068><s%> le-hit-nad-Dev to offer so willingly כָּזֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> ka-Zot; likewise כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for מִמְּךָ֣ <S%H4480><s%> mi-me-Cha at הַכֹּ֔ל <S%H3605><s%> hak-Kol, things וּמִיָּדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> u-mi-ya-de-Cha after this sort;for all things [come] of thee and of thine own נָתַ֥נּוּ <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan-nu have we given לָֽךְ׃ Lach.
